title: Build HD Providers grocery and food delivery app

requirements.text: Create a home page displaying four product categories: Vegetables, Dairy, Groceries, and Food. Each category should be clickable and navigate to its respective product listing page.

quotes: Home page with categories (Vegetables, Dairy, Groceries, Food)

acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays exactly four categories: Vegetables, Dairy, Groceries, Food
Each category is clickable and navigates to the corresponding product listing page
Categories are visually distinct and easy to identify

requirements.text: Create a product listing page that displays products with images, names, and prices. Products should be filterable by the four categories (Vegetables, Dairy, Groceries, Food).

quotes: Product listing page with images and prices
Product list with images and prices

acceptanceCriteria: Product listing page shows product image, name, and price for each item
Products can be filtered by category (Vegetables, Dairy, Groceries, Food)
Product data is stored in the backend and retrieved dynamically

requirements.text: Implement add to cart functionality allowing users to add products to their shopping cart. Each product should have an 'Add to Cart' button that increments the quantity if the item is already in the cart.
acceptanceCriteria: Each product has an 'Add to Cart' button
Clicking the button adds the product to the cart or increments quantity if already present
Cart state persists across page navigation
Visual feedback confirms item was added to cart

requirements.text: Create a cart page displaying all items added to the cart with their quantities, individual prices, and a total amount calculation. Users should be able to adjust quantities or remove items from the cart.

quotes: Cart page with total amount calculation

acceptanceCriteria: Cart page lists all items with product name, quantity, and individual price
Users can increase or decrease item quantities
Users can remove items from the cart
Total amount updates dynamically based on cart contents
Empty cart displays appropriate message

requirements.text: Create a checkout page with two payment options: Cash on Delivery and UPI (offline payment). For UPI, display a QR code that users can scan to make payment manually outside the app. Include an order confirmation screen after checkout.

quotes: Checkout with Cash on Delivery + UPI (offline via QR)
Cash on Delivery and UPI payment option
users can select UPI and pay manually via QR

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout page displays two payment options: Cash on Delivery and UPI
Selecting UPI displays a QR code for manual payment
Order can be placed with either payment method selected
Order confirmation screen displays after successful checkout with order details
Order data is stored in the backend

requirements.text: Create an admin panel that allows adding new products (with name, price, category, and image) and editing existing products. Access to the admin panel should be restricted to specific authorized users.

quotes: Admin panel for adding and editing products with restricted access
Only specific users (me) should have admin access

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel has forms to add new products with fields for name, price, category, and image
Admin panel displays list of existing products with edit functionality
Products can be edited to update name, price, category, or image
Admin panel access is restricted and not publicly accessible
Changes to products are immediately reflected in the product listing page

requirements.text: Apply a clean, modern design throughout the entire application using a white background with green buttons. Ensure consistent styling across all pages with a simple and intuitive user interface.

quotes: Design should be simple, modern, white background with green buttons
Clean white background with green buttons

acceptanceCriteria: All pages use white background as the primary background color
All primary action buttons (Add to Cart, Checkout, Submit, etc.) are styled in green
Typography and spacing create a clean, modern aesthetic
Design is consistent across home, product listing, cart, checkout, and admin pages
UI is intuitive and easy to navigate

constraints: No authentication or login system should be implemented initially
UPI payment is offline only - users select it and pay manually via QR code, no real-time payment integration
Admin panel access restriction should be implemented without requiring user authentication
nonGoals: Order tracking or delivery status updates

required: Sample product images for vegetables category - tomatoes, onions, potatoes (vegetables-sample.dim_300x300.png)
Sample product images for dairy category - milk, cheese, yogurt (dairy-sample.dim_300x300.png)
Sample product images for groceries category - rice, flour, lentils (groceries-sample.dim_300x300.png)
Sample product images for food category - bread, eggs, snacks (food-sample.dim_300x300.png)
UPI QR code placeholder for offline payment (upi-qr-placeholder.dim_200x200.png)
